name: Ermini
description:
Designer: Abril Tort 

Higher Degree Training Course in Video Games and Visual Environments

Joc de consciència ecologista en el qual s’encarna el rol d’una llúdriga afectada per diversos agents externs.

Ecological awareness game, in which the player plays the role of an otter affected by various external agents is played.

SINOPSIS

Joc ambientat en un futur no gaire llunyà en el qual, una llúdriga  és caçada per un caçador i duta a una palleria per usar-ne la pell per fer abrics. Després de presenciar el destí fatal del seu company, es replanteja la seva posició i s’escapa per evitar el mateix final. S'embarca en un trajecte cap al retorn a la seva llar, situada a la llacuna del bosc, però per arribar-hi haurà de sortir de la ciutat i endinsar-se al bosc. 

Durant el trajecte haurà  de superar una serie de aconteixements que li dificultaràn la arribada a aquesta.

SYNOPSIS

A game set in the not too distant future in which an otter is hunted by a hunter and taken to a fabric to use its skin to make coats. After seeing the fate of his partner, he reconsiders his position and escapes to avoid the same end. He embarks himselve on a journey back to his home, located in the forest, but to get there he will have to leave the city and enter in the forest.

During the journey he will have to overcome a series of events that will make it difficult for him to reach it.
